body:
So I've run into a little issue with the Loot Hextech Crafting today. I have more than enough orange essence to upgrade my Tribal Ryze skin shard into a skin permanent, but for some reason the option is unavailable to me and clicking it does nothing. I 100% own Ryze, and he is not free-to-play this week. I've added a link to a screenshot of what my issue is. 

So far I've tried restarting the client a few times, but with no luck. Hopefully this is one of those glitches that sorts itself out with time, but if it isn't then I do hope somebody could help me out with this!

replies.body: It's because you already own the skin. Up the top right of the shard it tells ya :)
Pffffff, I feel so silly. I thought that meant I owned the champion. I never play Ryze so if I got this skin from a chest previously I must have just forgotten :P
I think we've all done it at least once. I used to dabble in mystery gift trading a lot and don't know all the skins I own, so I've been there.
are you able to help me with my support ticket? ID: 32315775
I can't no, I'm only a volunteer not a Rioter. Do you have a specific problem with your request?
